message: I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This is a fair starting point considering the inflation rates we face.
I think a 52.5/47.5 split in my favor is more fair, considering the different inflation rates we face.  Let's get this done before things get worse!
Bob, time is running out and the money is losing value. I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle with a 52/48 split in my favor.  Let's be reasonable and close this deal.
